title: Business Analyst
description:
Minimum Qualification


Bachelor’s degree in related field.


Minimum Experience


10+ years of overall experience with 5+ years of experience as a BA in Banking Domain.
5+ years experience in Security Services applications (IPOs, Dividend payments, Shares, Corporate actions, Custody Services , Fund Management, Transfer Agency, and all other relevant services).
Experience in Banking Industry, preferably Corporate and Investment Banking.
Working Knowledge of relevant Microsoft applications, including Visio.
Proficient experience with data visualization using the latest technology.
Proven capabilities in project and user-testing management.
Proficient technical writing capabilities.
Hands-on experience generating process documentation and reports.
Proficiency in Statistical languages, statistical software.
Extensive analytical capability with use of tools.
Experience in business change through analytical skills
Strong knowledge of Project Methodologies like SDLC e.g. Waterfall, Iterative (Agile/Scrum).
Ability to work with people at all levels in an organisation and with people from many cultural backgrounds.
Experience in writing Business Case.
